did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of the Virginia Auctioneers Board,

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Auctioneers Board was established in 1983. A five-member board establishes regulations for obtaining and retaining certification, examines auctioneers for certification, and provides licensure/certification to the approximately 1,500 auctioneers and firms in Virginia. The Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation provides administrative support to the board.

odd.p: These records are part of the Virginia Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation record group (RG 17)

accessrestrict.p: Attachments must be reviewed for personal information and redacted prior to serving.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Auctioneers Board, Minutes, [please cite specific date and accession used], State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information

scopecontent.p: Official minutes, agendas and related attachments documenting the activities of the Virginia Auctioneers Board. May also include informal fact finding conference records and conflict of interest statements.
